stsjorbsmod:ArcaneWeaponPower.NAME: Arcane Weapon
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each turn, deal %1$s%2$s #yAttack #yDamage to a random enemy.

stsjorbsmod:BanishedPower.NAME: Banished
DESCRIPTIONS: Cannot give or receive damage. Cannot give or receive conditions.

stsjorbsmod:BlackTentaclesPower.NAME: Black Tentacles
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, all damage you deal to other enemies is dealt to this enemy instead.

stsjorbsmod:BookOfTonguesPower.NAME: Book of Tongues
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, draw #b%1$s random Material Component.
At the start of your turn, draw #b%1$s random Material Components.

stsjorbsmod:BurningPower.NAME: Burning
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, take #b%1$s damage, then reduce #yBurning by #b%2$s. You cannot heal.
At the start of its turn, takes #b%1$s damage, then reduce #yBurning by #b%2$s. It cannot heal.
Reduce healing by %1$s%%.

stsjorbsmod:CatharsisPower.NAME: Catharsis
DESCRIPTIONS: #yUnplayable #rCurse cards can now be played. Whenever you do, lose #b%3$s HP and deal #b%1$s damage to a random enemy for each Curse played this combat ( #b%2$s #rCurse played).
#yUnplayable #rCurse cards can now be played. Whenever you do, lose #b%3$s HP and deal #b%1$s damage to a random enemy for each Curse played this combat ( #b%2$s #rCurses played).

stsjorbsmod:ClarifyPower.NAME: Clarify
DESCRIPTIONS: Your draw pile is shown in order.

stsjorbsmod:CoilPower.NAME: Coil
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you remember a new, #ynon-Patience memory or end your turn while #ySnapped, deal #b%1$s damage to ALL enemies and lose all Coil.

stsjorbsmod:CoupDeGracePower.NAME: Coup de Gr√¢ce
DESCRIPTIONS: After #b%1d turn, target receives #yTrue Damage equal to double the damage prevented by intangible. (Deals #g%2d True Damage.)
After #b%1d turns, target receives #yTrue Damage equal to double the damage prevented by intangible. (Deals #g%2d True Damage.)
After #b%1d turn, you receive #yTrue Damage equal to double damage the prevented by intangible. (Deals #r%2d True Damage.)
After #b%1d turns, you receive #yTrue Damage equal to double damage the prevented by intangible. (Deals #r%2d True Damage.)

stsjorbsmod:DamnationPower.NAME: Damnation
DESCRIPTIONS: Permanently #yTransform the next #ynon-Legendary card played this combat.
Permanently #yTransform the next #ynon-Legendary card played this combat, then #yUpgrade it.

stsjorbsmod:DoubleCheckPower.NAME: Double-check
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your next turn, if you remember #yDiligence gain #yClarity.

stsjorbsmod:DoubleExhaustPower.NAME: Double
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, your next card that #yExhausts is played twice.
This turn, your next %1$s cards that #yExhaust are played twice.

stsjorbsmod:EnergizedCustomPower.NAME: Energized
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b%1$s additional [E] next turn.

stsjorbsmod:EntombedGrimoirePower.NAME: Entombed Grimoire
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn #b%2$s or when you #ySnap, #yExhume %1$s. NL
Exhumes in #b%3$s turns.
Exhumes in #b%3$s turn.

stsjorbsmod:EntombedGrimDirgePower.NAME: Entombed Grim Dirge
DESCRIPTIONS: %1$s will be Exhumed on the #b%2$srd turn. NL
Exhumes in #b%3$s turns.
Exhumes in #b%3$s turn.

stsjorbsmod:ExhumeAtStartOfTurnPower.NAME: Exhume
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your next turn, you will Exhume some cards.

stsjorbsmod:FearPower.NAME: Afraid
DESCRIPTIONS: Will escape in #b%1$s turn. If this ends the fight, keep Clarities for next fight.
Will escape in #b%1$s turns. If this ends the fight, keep Clarities for next fight.

stsjorbsmod:FindFamiliarPower.NAME: Find Familiar
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain #yClarity.

stsjorbsmod:FindWeaknessPower.NAME: Find Weakness
DESCRIPTIONS: Scry #b%1$s the first time you attack an enemy each turn. NL You have not played an Attack this turn.
Scry #b%1$s the first time you attack an enemy each turn. NL You have played an Attack this turn.

stsjorbsmod:FlameWardPower.NAME: Flame Ward
DESCRIPTIONS: When you are next attacked, apply #b%1$s #yBurning to ALL enemies and gain #b%2$s #yBlock.

stsjorbsmod:ForbiddenGrimoireDelayedExhu.NAME: Delayed Exhume
DESCRIPTIONS: %1$s will be Exhumed after you play #b%2$s more card.
%1$s will be Exhumed after you play #b%2$s more cards.

stsjorbsmod:FragilePower.NAME: Fragile
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, #ySnap. NL Lose #b%2$s HP and deal #b%3$s damage to ALL enemies.
At the end of turn #b%1$s, #ySnap. NL Lose #b%2$s HP and deal #b%3$s damage to ALL enemies.

stsjorbsmod:IntrospectionPower.NAME: Introspection
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each turn, lose #b
HP and deal #b
damage to ALL enemies. Deal
additional damage per Clarity.

stsjorbsmod:LoseStrengthNextTurnPower.NAME: Lose Strength Next Turn
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of next turn, lose #b%1$s Strength.

stsjorbsmod:MagicMirrorPower.NAME: Magic Mirror
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an enemy applies a debuff to you, apply that debuff to ALL enemies.
Whenever an enemy applies a debuff to you, apply that debuff to ALL enemies #b%1$s times.

stsjorbsmod:MindGlassPower.NAME: Mind Glass
DESCRIPTIONS: When you next gain #yClarity, deal #b%1$s damage to ALL enemies.

stsjorbsmod:MirroredTechniquePower.NAME: Mirrored Technique
DESCRIPTIONS: Play all attacks an additional time for each time you are being attacked.
Play all attacks an additional time for each time you are being attacked + %1$d.

stsjorbsmod:MirrorImagePower.NAME: Mirror Image
DESCRIPTIONS: A Mirror Image stands ready to intercept %1$s attack for you.
A Mirror Image stands ready to intercept %1$s attacks for you.

stsjorbsmod:MirrorPower.NAME: Mirror
DESCRIPTIONS: For #b%1$s turn, take no damage and reflect attack damage enemies deal to you.
For #b%1$s turns, take no damage and reflect attack damage enemies deal to you.

stsjorbsmod:MustClarifyBeforeRemembering.NAME: Refuse to Forget
DESCRIPTIONS: You cannot remember other memories until you have #yClarity of your current memory.

stsjorbsmod:OldBookPower.NAME: Old Book
DESCRIPTIONS: When you would die, instead #rDestroy #yOld Book.
When you would die, instead #rDestroy #yOld Book+ and heal #b%1d%% of your max HP.

stsjorbsmod:OverkillPower.NAME: Overkill
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal Overkill damage to all other enemies.
Deal Overkill damage + #b%1$s to all other enemies.

stsjorbsmod:PathosPower.NAME: Pathos
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, cards in your hand cost 0. Add a curse to your discard pile for each card played.
For #b%1$s turns, cards in your hand cost 0. Add a curse to your discard pile for each card played.

stsjorbsmod:PhantasmPower.NAME: Phantasm
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain #yIntangible, deal #b%1$s damage to ALL enemies.

stsjorbsmod:PlayNextAttackThisTurnAdditi.NAME: Gather Power
DESCRIPTIONS: The next attack you play this turn is played an additional time.
The next attack you play this turn is played an additional #b%1$s times.

stsjorbsmod:PlayNextCardThisTurnAddition.NAME: Quicksilver
DESCRIPTIONS: The next card you play this turn is played an additional time.
The next card you play this turn is played an additional #b%1$s times.

stsjorbsmod:PossessionPower.NAME: Possessed
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, this creature will deal #b%1$s damage to random allies #b%2$s time.
This turn, this creature will deal #b%1$s damage to random allies #b%2$s times.

stsjorbsmod:PrestidigitationPower.NAME: Prestidigitation
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, apply #b%1$s Weak or #b%2$s Vulnerable to a random enemy.

stsjorbsmod:PyromancyPower.NAME: Pyromancy
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #yBurning, apply that much #yBurning #b%1$s extra time.
Whenever you apply #yBurning, apply that much #yBurning #b%1$s extra times.

stsjorbsmod:ReapAndSowPower.NAME: Reap and Sow
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the next combat, deal #b%1d damage to ALL enemies.

stsjorbsmod:RediscoveryPower.NAME: Rediscovery
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain #yClarity of a new memory, gain #b%1$s [E]

stsjorbsmod:ReducedHealingPower.NAME: Cannot heal
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce healing by %1$s%%.

stsjorbsmod:RepressedMemoryPower.NAME: Repressed Memory
DESCRIPTIONS: #yExert Repressed Memory at the end of the combat.

stsjorbsmod:SacrificePower.NAME: Sacrifice
DESCRIPTIONS: Pay Max HP instead of [E] for #b%1d turn.
Pay Max HP instead of [E] for #b%1d turns.

stsjorbsmod:ShrapnelBloomPower.NAME: Shrapnel Bloom
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, your next #ynon-Legendary card is played %1d additional time, then #yExerts.
This turn, your next #ynon-Legendary card is played %1d additional times, then #yExerts.

stsjorbsmod:SnappedPower.NAME: Snapped
DESCRIPTIONS: You cannot remember any memories or clarities.

stsjorbsmod:SpiritShieldPower.NAME: Spirit Shield
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce all damage by #b%2$s for #b%1$s turn.
Reduce all damage by #b%2$s for #b%1$s turns.

stsjorbsmod:StrangePendantPower.NAME: Strange Pendant
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce the first damage taken each turn by #b%1$s.

stsjorbsmod:StrengthNextTurnPower.NAME: Strength Next Turn
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of next turn, gain #b%1$s Strength.

stsjorbsmod:SummoningPower.NAME: Summoning
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of next turn, #yExhume %1$s.

stsjorbsmod:TroublePower.NAME: Trouble
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a Curse, draw #b%1$s card.
Whenever you draw a Curse, draw #b%1$s cards.

stsjorbsmod:WastingFormPower.NAME: Wasting Form
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a Curse, deal #b%1$s damage to ALL enemies.

stsjorbsmod:WitheringPower.NAME: Withering
DESCRIPTIONS: Intangible reduces HP loss and damage taken by #b%1$s less.
